title: GeM Sahay
description:
The GeM Sahay mobile application enables you to apply for and avail short term financing offered by Banks and NBFCs such as Kotak Mahindra Bank, UGRO Capital, 121 Finance on the Purchase Orders that you receive on the GeM portal. This program has participation from some of the top lenders in the country. Lenders offer terms with interest rates from 12% to 20% per annum (based on your credit profile), with tenures ranging from 60 to 120 days and upto 90% of the Purchase Order value. The application process is entirely digital and if approved by the lender, the loan will be disbursed in as quickly as 10 minutes. 

An example of loan you could get at GeM Sahay is shared below

Loan Amount - Rs 20000, Interest Rate - 15% per annum, Loan Tenure - 85 days, Interest Rate - Rs 699, Total Repayment - Rs 20699

Currently this service is only available to Sole Proprietors registered on the GeM Platform.

In order to be able to register for the service you need to “opt in” for the GeM Sahay service in the profile section of your GeM portal account.

The service through the app will be free of charge for you, and no fee whatsoever apart from the interest rate being charged by the lenders would be payable.

comments: Since from 8-10 months, I am unable to registration, every time I open the app asks for update if it opens asks PAN number, after add my PAN it shows system error. Fed up with this app

Very regretfully I would like to mention that the app looks nonfunctional, because it ask for update from the very moment it was downloaded on device , this is good app to make people frustrated . Update Button is totally nonresposive despite of pressing update link n number of time. The app administrator is requested to please make it functional or withdraw it from play store unless until it is made fully functional so that people can be saved from vestful exercise of downloading this poor app
not opening the app at the time of opening is asks for entering PAN after giving the PAN DETAILS it is showing system error
Purchase Order can't be seen. We have raised ticket. But Not having any SAHAY from technical team.
App doesn't work. All time update and update. While try to open it shows, app download screen where uninstall or ok click option only It has been happening since many days
